title: Insurance Prediction System
description: Built an ML-powered system that predicts insurance amounts using ensemble learning techniques. Implemented backend logic and integrated it with a user-friendly frontend.

title: Face Attendance System
description: A computer vision project that marks student attendance using face recognition. Integrated with MongoDB Atlas for data storage and AWS S3 for image storage with real-time recognition.

title: Portfolio Website
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React (Vite) to showcase projects, skills, and experience in an interactive and responsive manner.

title: Job Portal
description: A platform that connects job seekers with recruiters, offering job opportunities and tools for recruiters to evaluate candidates' skills and qualifications.
